name: Excela formerly Excela Creative
tagline: Big Picture Thinking. Hands-on and In-house.
description:
Excela Creative is a web design & development firm based in Los Angeles, CA. 

While countless design sites may lead you to believe that your company’s identity is as simple as a logo design, consider how many times a day you see advertisements and marketing in various forms. Your brand is a collection of all the various touch points that reach your target market. All that you communicate is translated into an identity that is larger than just a logo or just your website. 
The key advantage with Excela Creative is that we facilitate the entire process of packaging your brand to create an identity that communicates the right message to your audience. Because we don’t outsource our services to outside firms, each and every piece of the puzzle is put together strategically and in harmony to ensure your entire brand is packaged just right. 
Big picture thinking that will take your ideas and bring them to life.
